# The `HTTPServer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An HTTP server which can listen on a single TCP/IP port for HTTP requests and delgate them to the appropriate registered handler. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::HTTPServer</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

An HTTP server which can listen on a single TCP/IP port for HTTP requests and delgate them to the appropriate registered handler.

Definition at line 99 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfod/httpserver-h">HTTPServer.h</a>.

### get() {#a57df1a0b2431ed4c6afb10acfb6108d1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error HTTPServer::get (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> UrlPathPattern, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a484725ce6bbff0f1751423cac5f22370">HTTPRequestHandler</a> Handler)</>}>
Registers a URL pattern routing rule.

When the server is listening, each request is dispatched to the first registered handler whose UrlPathPattern matches the UrlPath.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfod/httpserver-h/#l00114">114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfod/httpserver-h">HTTPServer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfod/httpserver-cpp/#l00175">175</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfod/httpserver-cpp">HTTPServer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### listen() {#a98e1c84406f4cfcae0f250846f16c427}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Error HTTPServer::listen ()">
Attempts to listen for requests on the bound port.

Returns an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> if called before binding a port.
